subtasks: Enter the combine harvester
Secure seat belt and review controls
Start the combine engine
Adjust combine settings for the current crop
Begin forward movement towards the field edge
Monitor combine performance and adjust settings as necessary
Perform routine maintenance checks (e.g., fluid levels, tire pressure)
Adjust combine direction as needed to navigate the field efficiently
Stop the combine at appropriate intervals for harvesting interruptions
Unplug and replant rows if needed
Monitor the grain tank filling and emptying cycles
Operate the combine hydraulic lift to load collected grain
Properly secure grain after each harvest interval
Clean the combine following harvest to maintain equipment integrity

tasks.task: Drive a utility vehicle to transport equipment
subtasks: Enter the utility vehicle
Secure seat belt and review mirrors
Start the utility vehicle engine
Check fuel levels and tire pressure before driving
Navigate from the combine location to the next field segment
Transport any necessary tools or equipment to the field
Safely operate the utility vehicle on field roads and tracks
Park the utility vehicle in a safe location between harvesting intervals

tasks.task: Set up and adjust a cultivator
subtasks: Mobilize the cultivator to the field
Secure the cultivator to the tractors drawbar
Adjust the cultivator depth and angle settings
Align the cultivator with the crop rows
Check the cultivator tines for proper coverage and penetration
Monitor the cultivator operation during plowing to ensure effective soil mixing
Adjust settings if crop residue or soil conditions require different tine angles
Stop and make necessary adjustments during breaks or when stopping for the day
Retrieve and stow the cultivator after use

tasks.task: Drive a tractor pulling a fertilizer spreader
subtasks: Enter the tractor and secure safety straps
Start the tractor and check all gauges
Attach the fertilizer spreader to the tractor
Determine the appropriate spreading pattern and rate based on crop needs
Adjust the spreader settings for even distribution
Drive at the recommended speed while spreading fertilizer
Monitor spreader performance and check for malfunctions or uneven spreading
Address any issues by adjusting speed, spreader settings, or cleaning nozzles as needed
Finish spreading the fertilizer across the field rows
Detach the spreader and store it properly for next use

tasks.task: Apply pesticide using a sprayer trailer
subtasks: Prepare the sprayer trailer by checking fluid levels and nozzles
